name: 摩美々
text:
──いきまぁす
……っ、くしゅっ……！
trans:
Let's begin~
...Achoo!

name: 恋鐘
text: はぁいっ！　…………じゃなかぁっ！？
trans: Alright~! ...Oh it's wrong!?

name: 恋鐘
trans: Mamimi!!

name: 結華
text: お手つきだね～
trans: You touched the wrong card!

name: 咲耶
text: ああ、お手つきだ
trans: Yeah, you touched the wrong card.

name: 霧子
text: こ……恋鐘ちゃん……
trans: K-Kogane...

name: 恋鐘
text: 今のはなしやろ～～！？
trans: That was a no count right!?

name: 摩美々
text: じゃー恋鐘、１回休みでー
trans: Well then, Kogane, skip one turn.

name: 恋鐘
trans: EEHH!!!

name: 摩美々
text: はい、いきまぁす
trans: Alright, let's begin.

name: 摩美々
text: ──『遠くの一家より、近くの隣』
trans: "A neighbour rather than faraway kin"

name: 恋鐘
text:
うち、お笑いがよかよ～お笑い～！
正月やもん～！
trans:
I wanna watch a comedy show, a comedy show~!
It is New Year's~!

name: 咲耶
text:
フフ、駅伝も素晴らしいものだよ
ドラマと涙があり、時には笑いもある
trans:
Heh, a relay is wonderful too.
There is drama and tears, and funny parts at times too.

name: 咲耶
text: おせちをつまむには、うってつけさ
trans: It's perfect to watch while snacking on New Years foods.

name: 恋鐘
text:
ん～そいはそうばってん～……
お笑いもおせちにうってつけばい～！
trans:
Hmm, that might be true...
But a comedy show is also perfect fer New Year food~!

name: 結華
text: まみみんは何がいい？
trans: What would you like to watch Mamimin?

name: 摩美々
text: ニュースー
trans: The news.

name: 摩美々
text:
振り返らないとー
世の中がどうなってるかぁ
trans:
We have to look back on
the situation of the world.

name: 恋鐘
text:
え～！
摩美々、さっきから関係なか動画ば見よったとに～？
trans: Eh~! Mamimi, even though yer watchin' unrelated videos since just now~?

name: 摩美々
text: ふふー、チャンネル権は平等でしょー
trans: Fufu, we have equal rights to the channels, am I right?

name: 恋鐘
text:
もう～！
冗談言っとらんで、ちゃんと考えてほしか～！
trans:
Man~! Quit jokin' around,
and think 'bout it properly~!

name: 結華
text: きりりんは？
trans: What about you Kiririn?

name: 霧子
text:
わ、わたしは……
えっと……
trans:
I-I...
Umm...

name: 結華
text:
やー、水中カメラで撮ると迫力が違うわ……
おっきいお魚だぁ……
trans: Wow, filming with an underwater camera really is impressive... The fishes are huge...

name: 結華
text: ──あ、昆布じめ美味しい……
trans: Ah, kelp with raw fish is delicious...

name: 咲耶
text:
フフ、そして美しい……
どこか悲しみさえ湛えているような目だ
trans: Heh, and they are beautiful... Somehow, it feels like there is sadness in their eyes.

name: 霧子
text:
うん……
命を懸けて……卵を産むんだね……！
trans:
Yeah...
They're risking their lives... to lay their eggs...!

name: 霧子
text:
──あ、咲耶さん
煮物……お箸届かなかったら……──
trans:
Ah, Sakuya...
The dishes... if you can't reach them...

name: 咲耶
text:
おや、ありがとう、霧子
では、レンコンを取ってもらおうかな
trans: My thank you, Kiriko. Well then, could you help me get the lotus root?

name: 恋鐘
text: ん～、絶滅する前に見てみたかぁ～
trans: Hmm, I wanna see them before they go extinct!

name: 恋鐘
text: ──結華、こっちの卵巻きも食べんね
trans: Yuika, eat these eggrolls too!

name: 結華
text: お、ありがとー
trans: Oh, thanks!

name: 摩美々
text:
……ねぇ
まだ観るの、これー
trans:
......
...Hey, are we still watching this?

name: 結華
text:
もちろん。一度チャンネルが決まったら、
最低30分は観るルールだったでしょ
trans: Of course. Once we've decided on a channel, we watch for at least 30 minutes, that was the rule.

name: 摩美々
text: えー……
trans: Eh...

name: 咲耶
text:
フフ、『幻の魚、イトウを追って』
……なかなかよくできたドキュメンタリーじゃないか
trans:
Heh, "Chasing the phantom fish, the Japanese huchen"
...It's a rather well done documentary.

name: 霧子
text:
ま、摩美々ちゃん……ごめんね……！
わたしが……変なこと言っちゃったから……
trans:
M-Mamimi... I'm sorry...!
It's all... because I said something weird...

name: 恋鐘
text: 霧子は悪くなか。リモコンが悪かったと
trans: It's not Kiriko's fault. It's the remote's fault!

name: 摩美々
text: ていうかぁ……
trans: I mean...

name: 摩美々
text: 『観たいチャンネル同時押しルール』はいいんだケドー
trans: "The rule to press all the buttons for the channels we want to watch" is fine and all~

name: 摩美々
text: そのチャンネル、誰も押してないじゃんー
trans: But nobody even pressed that channel.

name: 結華
text:
まぁまぁ、何かの拍子にこうなっちゃうこともあるって
ほら、まみみんもおせち食べな？
trans: Oh well, things like that happen from time to time! Come on Mamimin, you eat some New Year's food too alright?

name: 摩美々
text: ……んー
trans: ...Mmm.

name: 摩美々
text:
じゃあ、伊達巻取ってー
って……ちょっと、恋鐘ー
trans:
Then, get me the rolled omelet.
Wait... Hold on, Kogane~

name: 恋鐘
trans: Hm?

name: 摩美々
text: 伊達巻はひとり２個でしょー
trans: We each eat 2 rolled omelets right~?

name: 恋鐘
text:
ふぇ……？
うそー！　うち、これ３個め～！？
trans:
Eeh...? Yer kiddin'~!
This is my third one~!?

name: 摩美々
text: そう
trans: Right.

name: 恋鐘
text:
わ、悪かったね～！
えっと……
trans:
I-I'm sorry~!
Umm...

name: 恋鐘
text: そいじゃあはい！　あ～して！
trans: Well then! Open wide!

name: 摩美々
trans: Wha... Eh...?

name: 恋鐘
text: はいっ！　こいば食べてよかよ～
trans: Here! Ya can eat this one!

name: 摩美々
text: じ、自分で取るからぁ……
trans: I-I can take it myself...

name: 咲耶
text:
クス、ならその伊達巻、私が頂こうかな
あーん、してもらえるかい？
trans:
Tch. Then can I have that rolled omelet?
Ahhhn. Can you feed me?

name: 恋鐘
text: もちろんよかよ～！　はい、あー──
trans: Of course it's okay! Here, open wi──

name: 摩美々
text: 咲耶も３個めでしょー
trans: Isn't this Sakuya's third one too?

name: 咲耶
text: フフッ、バレてしまったか
trans: Heheh, so you found out.

name: 恋鐘
text: そ、そいやったらこん伊達巻、どげんすればよかと～！？
trans: I-In that case, what do we do with this rolled omelet~!?

name: 摩美々
text: だからぁ、皿に置いてー
trans: Like I said, leave it on the plate.

name: 結華
text: ……ふふ
trans: ...Fufu,

name: 結華
text: なんか、お正月ってさ、こういう感じだよね
trans: You know, New Year's should feel like this, right?

name: 霧子
text: ……結華ちゃん？
trans: ...Yuika?

name: 結華
text:
みんなでわいわいご飯食べて、
なんでもないことでちょっと騒いで、ゆっくりするの
trans: Everyone eating a meal, having a blast, making a racket over little things and relaxing.

name: 結華
text: 今家にいるなぁって、一番感じられる感じ
trans: This feeling, it's almost like being at home.

name: 霧子
text: ふふっ、そうだね……
trans: Fufu, you're right...

name: 結華
text: ──でしょ
trans: Right?

name: 結華
text:
あのね、三峰、
実家でお正月迎えないの、初めてなんだ
trans:
You see, it's Mitsumine's first time
not being able to spend New Year's at home.

name: 恋鐘
text: ふぇっ？　そうやったとね～！
trans: Ohh? Oh that's right~!

name: 咲耶
text: フフ、実は私もさ
trans: Heh, actually it's the same for me.

name: 結華
text:
そっかぁ、こがたんは違うんだっけ
さくやんは三峰と一緒だよねぇ
trans:
I see, Kogatan's different
Sakuyan's the same as Mitsumine!

name: 結華
text:
……っていうか、そっちいいの？
伊達巻の決着はついた？
trans: ...So, is everything settled over there? Did you come to a conclusion about the rolled omelet?

name: 摩美々
text: それはこれからつけるー
trans: We're going to settle it now~

name: 咲耶
text: なんてことだ……これじゃゆっくりする暇もない
trans: Goodness... There isn't any time to relax at all.

name: 結華
text: あははっ、まみみんが相手じゃねぇ
trans: Ahaha, not when you're facing Mamimin~

name: 霧子
text: ふふふっ……
trans: Fufu...

name: 結華
text:
……なんか、
もうちょっと寂しかったりするものかなーって思ってたけど
trans:
...For some reason Mitsumine thought
that it'll feel more lonely.

name: 結華
text: お正月だねぇ、ちゃんと
trans: It really is the New Year, isn't it?

name: 摩美々
text: ……まぁ、わからなくはないケドー
trans: ...Well, I get what you mean~

name: 恋鐘
text: 遠くのごちそうより、近くのおせちってことやね？
trans: Rather than the meal that is far away, the New Year's food that's close to ya is better, right?

name: 恋鐘
text:
うちのおせち、
結華と咲耶んちのには勝てんかもしれんけど
trans: My New Year's food might not be better than those from Yuika or Sakuya's home.

name: 恋鐘
text: こげん近くにあるとやけん、た～んと食べて！
trans: It's this close to ya, make sure to eat lots!

name: 結華
text: ──ありがと、こがたん！
trans: Thanks, Kogatan!

name: 恋鐘
text: うん～！　伊達巻、もっと作ってくるけんね！
trans: Yeah~! We gotta make more rolled omelets!

name: 咲耶
text: ありがとう、遠慮はしないよ
trans: Thanks, I won't hold back.

name: 霧子
text:
ふふ……
──あ
trans:
Fufu...
Ah...

name: 霧子
text: 30分……経ったよ……！
trans: The 30 minutes... is up...!

name: 結華
text: おっ、じゃあ再戦といきますか！
trans: Oh, then let's go for a rematch!

name: 恋鐘
text: はぁいっ！　お笑いお笑い～！
trans: Alright! Comedy show, comedy show~!

name: 咲耶
text: 駅伝かな
trans: I'll go for a relay.

name: 摩美々
text: 未確認生物の特集ー
trans: A special on unidentified organisms.

name: 恋鐘
text: オーダーの変わっとる！？
trans: Yer request has changed!?

name: 霧子
text:
そ、それじゃあ……
ボタンに指を置いてください……！
trans:
W-Well then...
place your fingers on the buttons...!

name: 霧子
text: レディ……──
trans: Ready...

name: 結華
text: せーの！
trans: One, two!

name: 一同
text: 『遠くの一家より、近くの隣』
trans: "A closer neighbour better than a distant family"

name: 一同
text: 『近くで生活する人たちは、けっこう頼りになる』
trans: "The people living close to you can be rather reliable"

name: 咲耶
text: フフ……まるで私たちのことのようだね
trans: Heh... It's like it's referring to us.
